sprint.name: Feed Management
sprint.description: Allow users to view master feeds, create custom feeds, and manage feed availability for diet optimization.

user_stories.title: View Master Feed Library
user_stories.description: As a farmer, I want to browse available feeds so I can select appropriate ones for my cattle.

tasks.title: Create feeds list page
tasks.description: Build page showing all available feeds grouped by category.

tasks.title: Create feed card component
tasks.description: Card showing feed name, type, category, price per kg.

tasks.title: Implement category tabs/filter
tasks.description: Filter feeds by category (Roughage, Concentrate, etc.).

tasks.title: Implement search
tasks.description: Add search box to filter feeds by name.

tasks.title: Cache feed library locally
tasks.description: Store feed library in Dexie for offline access.

test_cases.title: Search Feeds
test_cases.expected_result: Only feeds with 'maize' in name show

user_stories.title: View Feed Details
user_stories.description: As a farmer, I want to see detailed nutritional information about a feed.

tasks.title: Create feed detail page
tasks.description: Build page showing all feed nutritional parameters.

tasks.title: Display nutrient breakdown
tasks.description: Show table with DM, CP, EE, CF, NDF, ADF, minerals, etc.

tasks.title: Display price information
tasks.description: Show price per kg, price source, last updated date.

user_stories.title: Create Custom Feed
user_stories.description: As a farmer, I want to add a custom feed if my local feed isn't in the library.

tasks.title: Create add custom feed page
tasks.description: Build form for creating custom feed with all parameters.

tasks.title: Build feed name and type inputs
tasks.description: Input for feed name, select for feed type and category.

tasks.title: Build nutritional parameter inputs
tasks.description: Inputs for DM, CP, NDF, etc. with validation.

tasks.title: Build price input
tasks.description: Input for price per kg with currency.

tasks.title: Submit to custom feed API
tasks.description: POST to /insert-custom-feed/ endpoint.

tasks.title: Implement offline custom feed creation
tasks.description: Queue custom feed locally if offline.

tasks.title: Add helper tooltips
tasks.description: Add info icons explaining each nutritional parameter.

acceptance_criteria: User can enter all feed parameters
Custom feed appears in feed list after creation

test_cases.title: Create Custom Feed
test_cases.expected_result: Feed created and appears in list

user_stories.title: Edit Custom Feed
user_stories.description: As a farmer, I want to update my custom feed if I made a mistake or values changed.

tasks.title: Create edit feed form
tasks.description: Reuse create form with pre-populated values.

tasks.title: Submit to update API
tasks.description: POST to /update-custom-feed/ endpoint.

tasks.title: Handle offline edits
tasks.description: Queue edits for sync when offline.

acceptance_criteria: Form pre-fills with current feed data
Changes save and reflect in feed list

user_stories.title: Delete Custom Feed
user_stories.description: As a farmer, I want to remove a custom feed I no longer use.

tasks.title: Add delete option
tasks.description: Add delete button with confirmation dialog.

tasks.title: Submit delete API
tasks.description: DELETE to /feeds/delete-feed/{feed_id}.

acceptance_criteria: Feed removed from list after confirmation
Only custom feeds can be deleted (not master feeds)

user_stories.title: Feed Selection for Diet
user_stories.description: As a farmer, I want to select which feeds are available to me for diet optimization.

tasks.title: Create feed selector component
tasks.description: Multi-select component for choosing available feeds.

tasks.title: Implement select all by category
tasks.description: Allow selecting all feeds in a category at once.

tasks.title: Save feed preferences
tasks.description: Store user's typical feed selection for reuse.

tasks.title: Integrate with diet form
tasks.description: Use selector in diet optimization step 5.

acceptance_criteria: Selection is saved for next time
Selected feeds sent to optimization API

sprint_goals: Full feed library browsing and search
Feed selection integrated with diet optimization
